description: The death toll in the port city has hit 50 after two overnight explosions, which burned countless cars, shattered windows for blocks and injured hundreds of people.
title: Devastation in Tianjin, China
title_page: Devastation in Tianjin, China - The New York Times
text: Smoke billowed on Thursday from the site of two explosions that reduced a parking lot filled with new cars to charred remains at a warehouse in Tianjin, China.
